congrats_message: You have discovered what combination of liquids you need to turn it red. The question now is about the other liquids in the other glasses. In this experiment, what do these other liquids do? Again, to answer this question, you will need to try pouring more combinations of liquids and see what happens. When you believe you have figured it out, press the 'I KNOW' button. If you cannot figure it out, press the 'I GIVE UP' button.
